dataset.select: SELECT id, section, note FROM link_section ORDER BY section
dataset.update: UPDATE link_section SET section = BTRIM ({{section}}), note = BTRIM ({{note}}), change_user = {{__username}}, change_date = now() WHERE id = {{id}};
dataset.insert: INSERT INTO link_section (section, note, change_user, change_date) VALUES (BTRIM ({{section}}), BTRIM ({{note}}), {{__username}}, now());
